评论概述: Quality sux not the same as they used to be
评论详情: I've been buying and wearing Dickies carpenter jeans for most of my life. I bought these 2 pair and after wearing them 2-3 times, both pair have torn at the crotch. I am a Superintendent of construction so I am not down in the ditch working in them. I am very disappointed in the quality. These were a much lighter fabric than what they used to be. Unfortunately the return window is closed. Just got off the phone with Dickies looks like they are going to honor a warranty and send me 2 new pair. I guess bottom line is don't buy them from Amazon, buy them directly from Dickies or a brick and mortar retailer that you can check them out in person before purchase. I will update after warranty process is complete.

These are Dickies jeans at a good price.  Some reviewers have complained that the pockets and even the waistlines are smaller than what the reviewer already has. These pants seem the same as the older dickies we have. They fit the same and look nice.

Unfortunately, due to unfortunate circumstances, it was not discovered until the return date expired that these jeans had a manufacturing defect and were not sewn properly, with one leg being smaller than the other.  Of course they're still new, because it's impossible to wear them!  It's very disappointing that the company is not willing to stand by their product and offer a refund or even be willing to inspect the jeans to see the problem.

类型: Size: 40W x 34LColor: Stone Washed Indigo Blue
评论详情: We always buy 5 pairs of these jeans for work, once or twice a year.  I had originally ordered the same size he currently wears, and they were literally 4 inches smaller.  So we order these, at 4 inches larger, and they are cartoonishly gigantic.  We ordered 4 inches larger on the waist and kept the length, but these were at least 8" longer in the leg.  I don't know what is going on with Dickeys, but I'm so so so frustrated trying to buy jeans that fit.  It's not like I'm buying the size based off another brand or style.  IT'S THE SAME JEANS.  So ridiculous.  Now I have to return ANOTHER huge box.

Great fit , comfortable. Pockets are generously sized except for the pocket watch pocket and the access to the front pockets are too high and too small. But the pants are a good fit and very comfortable.
Very well made at a good price that seriously competes with all stores.
Very baggy fits good

评论概述: Used to be absolutely great! USED to be...
评论详情: I have no idea what happened, but these newer work pants are THIN! I just blew out a brand new pair and its obvious why. These new models are much thinner and just ripped right in my crotch. I might be done with buying Dickies carpenter jeans after over 20 years of buying them for work. These used to be hands down they best work pants for construction you can buy, but my new ones just aren't the same. They don't have that denim jeans feel to them. What makes matters worse is that, if they would have let go earlier in the day, and I would have went home because of it, it would have cost me about $250 to miss a half a day's work. I could have spent more money on better jeans than these and came out ahead. Luckily, they split right near the end of the day. I'm seriously going to think long and hard about this. I can't have this. I need the dependability these used to give me. Seems like they seriously cheapened these to be unusable for work.
Well made and fits 👌 to size.
Ive been buying dickies pants for years. My weight has stayed constant I ordered my normal size and apparently I put on 2 inches. Still wearing my old size. They also don't feel the same.

评论概述: Un problema en la parte de atrás
评论详情: No sé como explicar esto y no sé si sea el único, pero... el pantalón en general me encanta, el color, el fit, todo, es bello, pero la parte del trasero queda como muy metida hacía adentro, pensé que era solo yo, pero lo probé con dos amigos más y paso lo mismo, si no te molesta sentir que se mete en tu trasero, compralo.
